title: Did the story of the Corona virus vaccine go on the same day as reports of Cuban death?
subtitle: The story of the death of the national basketball legend dominated the emerging COVD-19 epidemic in the United States in late January 2020.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: Today, the United States of America published an article on the first page on the development of a COVID-19 vaccine on the same day as the death of Kobe Bryant was reported.
